event_description: Due to General Work Order, both directions Hudson Bergen Light Rail from Garfield Ave Light Rail Stop (Jersey City) to Martin Luther King Dr Light Rail S (Jersey City) will resume partial service. Shuttle buses will continue. All customers utilizing West Side Avenue Station will be required to board a shuttle bus to/from MLK Station for Light Rail Service. The shuttle bus will depart West Side Avenue Station every day, 3 times per hour, from 5:25AM to 11:25PM and then again at 12:25AM at the following times each hour :05, :25 and :45. Shuttle-bus trips from MLK to West Side Avenue stations will depart after the train arrives at MLK Station. The last shuttle buses to West Side Avenue Station will be at 12:55AM, 1:15AM, 1:40AM and 2:10AM. Northbound trains will depart MLK Station at :05, :25, :45 , starting at 5:45AM and then operateevery 20 minutes until 11:45 PM. The final two departing trains times are 12:19AM and 12:45AM. Northbound trains will depart Garfield Avenue Station at :07, :27, :47. Train service will begin at 5:47AM and then operate every 20 minutes until 11:47 PM. The final two departing train times are 12:21AM and 12:47AM. Southbound trains will arrive in Garfield Avenue Station at :13, :33, :53. Train service will begin at 6:13AM and then operate every 20 minutes until 1:13AM. The final two arriving trains times are 1:38AM and 2:08AM. Southbound trains will arrive in MLK Station at :15, :35, :55 Train service will begin at 6:15AM and then operate every 20 minutes until 1:15AM. We would like to remind customers that trains are running for healthcare workers, first responders and essential personnel only. If you don't absolutely need to be traveling, please stay home.
